document_data.name: Shayk Alhambrezzo
document_data.mainbody: '''Shayk Alhambrezzo''' was an [[alchemist]] who lived in the [[Savage Frontier]] region in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Shayk had very greasy and odorous hair, on account of a distinct pomade he used.
document_data.History: In [[1358 DR]], an [[adventurer]] group entered his shop and inadvertently destroyed an antique worth 50 [[gp]]. He then tasked them with bringing him as many horns, hides, and hooves as they could harvest from [[unicorn]]s found in the [[Unicorn Run]] of [[High Forest]]. He offered to pay them a thousand for each horn, two hundred for each hide, and fifty for each set of hooves.
